001package imagingbook.pluginutils.annotations;
002
003import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.PACKAGE;
004import static java.lang.annotation.ElementType.TYPE;
005import static java.lang.annotation.RetentionPolicy.RUNTIME;
006
007import java.lang.annotation.Retention;
008import java.lang.annotation.Target;
009
010/**
011 * Annotation to specify the menu path (tree branch) of the associated plugin class
012 * or an entire plugin package. Takes a {@link String} argument e.g.,
013 * <pre>
014 * {@literal @}IjMenuPath("Plugins&gt;My Stuff")
015 * {@literal @}IjMenuEntry("My Plugin")
016 * public class My_Plugin implements PlugInFilter {
017 *   ...
018 * }</pre>
019 * May also be used on the {@code package} declaration 
020 * in file {@code package-info.java} to set the default menu
021 * path for all plugins directly contained in that package (but not nested), e.g.,
022 * <pre>
023 * {@literal @}IjMenuPath("Plugins&gt;Binary Regions")
024 * package Binary_Regions;</pre>
025 * Annotations for individual plugin classes override the package-level setting.
026 */
027@Retention(RUNTIME)
028@Target({ TYPE, PACKAGE })
029public @interface IjMenuPath {
030        public String value();
031}
